subject: Baseball
Television
lead_paragraph: If the Mets lose, it is standard for television coverage to focus on a manager reacting to what hurts his team. If they win, it’s proper to show the manager cheering and shouting.
snippet: If the Mets lose, it is standard for television coverage to focus on a manager reacting to what hurts his team. If they win, it’s proper to show the manager cheering and shouting.
